text: The Assembly of Experts was created after the Islamic Revolution in Iran. It is an assembly of Islamic clerics who have the power to choose the successor of the Supreme Leader of Iran. == Other websites == * Assembly of Experts - Official website * Assembly of Experts in the Constitution of Islamic Republic of Iran * Understanding Iran's Assembly of Experts *Results of Assembly of Experts elections in 6 provinces *Results of Assembly of Experts elections in four provinces *Results of Assembly of Experts elections in some provinces Category:Organisations based in Iran Category:Islamic organizations Category:Electoral colleges
title: Assembly of Experts
